backend/main.mo: Defines comprehensive backend actor types for media content, users, ads, referrals, wallets, approvals, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented feature evidence entries linking features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short functional summaries for numerous frontend files used throughout the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and global styles for light/dark mode and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all public and admin routes, including guarded admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Renders a clickable banner ad that tracks views and clicks using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: Shows a styled access-denied screen with navigation back to home.
Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading or denial states as needed.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Displays up to three sidebar ads with automatic view tracking and click handling.
Renders a grid of clickable media categories that navigate to category-specific pages.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Implements a chat room with polling, file attachments, and message sending for a given room.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Displays a media item's thumbnail, metadata, and stats with click-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Shows all and popular content in tabbed grids and opens a player when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Modal player that handles video, audio, or image content with controls and rating UI.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Displays currently active content with playback and basic metadata, or a placeholder if none.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links, platform info, social icons, and admin login via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, search, auth handling, and admin menus for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with animated visuals, marketing text, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Interactive assistant widget with chat, speech recognition, speech synthesis, and user memory handling.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Embeds Jitsi Meet for video conferences, managing room creation, events, and participant states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, background theming, and conditional HeroHelper display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for initial profile setup with a simple name entry form.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: UI for shared playback rooms with basic play/pause state and room creation prompts.
frontend/src/components/VersionBadge.tsx: Displays the application version inside a styled badge.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: A UI component rendering a mock video call interface with mute, video toggle, and end-call controls.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: A form-driven UI for simulating WAN 2.2 AI content generation with tabs, inputs, and mock API responses.
frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts: Defines admin navigation items, section ordering, and route mappings for the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the application’s static version label 'Version 42'.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
Computes boolean capability flags from the current actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, storage, and context management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for reading and mutating backend data, including admin checks and image library actions. Provides wrappers around actor methods with caching, invalidation, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, layout behavior, typography, and utility classes. Ensures responsive text, overflow handling, and visual effects like gradients and glows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Provides an interface for creating, viewing, updating, deleting, and toggling ads. Uses React Query hooks to manage advertisement data and supports form inputs and basic analytics like CTR.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Allows admins to create and view affiliate commission tiers. Uses React Query to load tiers and submit new tier data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Displays all pending approval items including content, members, admins, card loads, price updates, payouts, and images. Provides approve/reject actions and visual status indicators using multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Provides a form to upload new multimedia content and a list for deleting existing items using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Manages theater display screen content, showing active content and allowing upload of new display media.
Handles approval, rejection, searching, and deletion of pending content submissions and related entities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Administers broadcast and hero join requests with approve/reject actions and tabbed viewing.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Supports uploading, approving, rejecting, downloading, and bulk-erasing images with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Handles accepting admin invite tokens, triggering login if needed and redeeming the invite via the actor before redirecting to the admin approvals page.
Displays, generates, and copies admin invite codes using actor API calls and react-query for list refreshes.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Implements a local CRUD interface for managing mall items, including create, update, delete, and basic inventory stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Provides an admin-only interface to upload media content with progress tracking and shows existing media grouped by type.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Fetches all user profiles via the actor and provides search and role filtering in a member directory view.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin interface for managing subscription, content, and mall-related pricing with tabbed categories and simulated save actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Admin page for editing platform terms and subscription pricing, including loading active terms and saving updates via API.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoomsPage.tsx: Lists navigable admin sections as cards, excluding the current page, allowing admins to access different management tools.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Dashboard for viewing, searching, and managing BTC wallet seeds and mock blockchain analytics with visibility and copy controls.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard showing referral stats, tiers, and link generation with copy and share functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays content for a selected category with loading states and allows opening items in a content player.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: Displays a mock Excalibur credit card with identity check and placeholder balance-loading logic.
Provides a creative workspace interface with Jitsi Meet, WAN 2.2 integrations, and project tabs.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Embeds and tests Flixiod streaming via iframe with navigation and informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Implements a Rocket.Chat–based chat interface with tabs and placeholder connection features gated by login.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring hero section, global streaming intro, and navigation to entertainment and financial services.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Provides a test page with an embedded iHeartRadio iframe player and links for streaming music and radio.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Displays Clear Magic Mall branding, a search bar, and a coming-soon notice for future shopping features.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Implements a user registration form with validation and a submission confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Lists streaming platforms with navigation to test pages or external links for various media services.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the active terms and conditions, handling loading and missing content states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Manages Bitcoin wallet creation, loading funds, and viewing wallet info using Counterparty node integration.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend TypeScript types mirroring expected backend structures for media, approvals, transactions, chats, and other domain models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, admin-room feature requirements, and pending requests for adding missing admin rooms.
